name.label: Connector name
name.description: Assign a name to uniquely identify the data source connection

description.label: Connector Description
description.description: Write a description to indicate the purpose of the data source connection

concurrent.label: Concurrent Search Limit
concurrent.description: The number of simultaneous connections that can be made between Cloud Pak for Security and the data source. The default limit for the number of connections is 4.

result_limit.label: Result Size Limit
result_limit.description: The maximum number of entries or objects that are returned by search query.The default result size limit is 1000. The value must not be less than 1 and must not be greater than 10,000.

timeout.label: Query Timeout Limit
timeout.description: The time limit in minutes for how long the query is run on the data source. The default time limit is 1. When the value is set to zero, there is no timeout. If the query takes longer than 1 min, it is likely to indicate a problem.

name.label: Configuration name
name.description: Assign a name to uniquely identify the data source configuration

description.label: Configuration Description
description.description: Write a description to indicate the purpose of the data source configuration
